Aḥmad Zakī Abū Shādī Family Papers
Aḥmad Zakī Abū Shādī Family Papers

[A remembrance of the poetry, art, and literature of Dr. Ahmed Zaki Abu Shadi, on the first anniversary of his death]: Recording, in Arabic, on cardboard disk, with portrait of Abu Shadi and accompanying text on recto, and photographs of American scenes on verso. Recording by Isa Khalid Sabbagh.
